sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Lord Walder has no granddaughter named "Marianne".  He does have a great-granddaughter named Marianne Vance, daughter of Ser Dafyn Vance and Maegelle Frey.  This Marianne is herself the granddaughter of Walder's eldest son, Ser [[Stevron Frey]].  She is among the Frey girls presented to Robb before Edmure's wedding.
sections.Biography:

===[[Season 3]]===
Along with several of Lord Frey's other daughters and granddaughters, [[Robb Stark]] had the option of marrying her. When he arrives at [[The Twins]] for his uncle [[Edmure Tully|Edmure]]'sÂ [[Red Wedding|wedding]], Robb apologizesÂ for his slight against them.<ref>"[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]"</ref>
